name: Kazuki Tanaka
body:
### Who am I?
Kazuki stared to maintain Ruby itself as one of 50 committers who are able to modify the source code of Ruby after he've been involved in many Rails projects. He is author of programming language Hilbert which is popular in mathematics field.

### Education
Keio University, Japan April 2011 ‒ March 2017 (expected)
Bachelor of Mathematical Statistics
September 2013 ‒ September 2015: Taking a leave of absence 

### Work Experience
##### Founder, Aisaac inc. September 2015 - Present
Aisaac is consulting corporation with the passion for contributing to open source projects and happiness of engineer.

##### Software Engineer, VenueSpot inc. September 2014 - Present
Manage whole web application which includes server infrastructure, Rails application and front-end's css and js.

##### Software Engineer, Freee inc. September 2013 - September 2014
A lot of contribution to rapidly growing the company by building scraping systems which syncs with customerʼs bank accounts from scratch. 

### Open Source Project
Ruby program language: Maintaining math module as one of committers.

Linux Ubuntu: Sending some patches which improves usability.

### Personal projects
Hilbert: Computational software program with Intuitive syntax.

Rubype(Ruby+Type): Type contracts for Ruby.

Enumerator-Parallel: It enable enumerator to be executed in parallel.

Dydx: Differential and integral calculus with Ruby.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
